mapper.select: SELECT distinct A.ACM_NAME, B.BOOK_NUM, B.checkin_Date, B.cheCkout_Date, B.book_Price FROM TBOOKING B, TBOOK_STATUS S, TACM A, TROM R WHERE B.BOOK_NUM=S.BOOK_NUM AND B.ROM_NUM=R.ROM_NUM AND R.ACM_NUM=A.ACM_NUM AND B.user_num=#{loginUserNum} order by to_number(substr(B.BOOK_NUM,2))
